chapter.text: Kafu. Eiko ni michita kuruan ni yotte chikau
Iya, kare-ra wa jibun-tachi no ma kara hitori no keikoku-sha ga arawareta koto ni odoroki, sokode fushinjin'na-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa mattaku fushigina kotodearu
Watashi-tachi ga shinde chiri ni natte (mata yomigaeru no) ka. Sore wa (rikai dekinai) tondemonai yomigaeridearu
Ware wa daichi ga, kare-ra o ikaga ni mushibami saru ka o shitte iru. Mata waga temoto ni wa,( 凡 Yuru shiju no) kiroku no chobo ga aru
Shinri ga otozureta toki, sore o kyogi to shitanode, kare-ra wa konran jotai ni ochitta
Kare-ra wa zujo no ten o minai no ka. Ware ga ikaga ni sore o sozo shi, ikaga ni sore o kazatta ka. Soshite soreni wa, sukoshi no kizu mo nai to iu no ni
Mata, ware wa daichi o uchi hiroge, sono-jo ni yamayama o sue, samazama no shurui no utsukushi (kusaki) o, oishigera seru
(Sorera wa) kaigo shite (omo no omoto ni) kaeru subete no shimo be ga, yoku kansatsu subeki kotodeari, kyokundearu
Ware wa mata, shukufuku suru ame o ten kara fura sete, kaju-en ya shukaku no kokumotsu o yutaka ni seicho sa seru
Bisshiri to mi o tsuketa take no takai natsumeyashi no ki wa
(arra no) shimo be-tachi no shokuryo. Mata sore (ame) de ware wa shinda daichi o yomigaera seru. Yobidashi (fukkatsu) ni shite mo onajiyona koto
Kare-ra izen mo,(shito o) uso-tsuki yobawari shita mono ga atta. Nufu no min mo, rassu no nakama mo samudo mo
mata ado no min mo, firuaun mo, ruto no doho mo
mata mori no nakama mata tobbau no min mo kai shito o uso-tsuki yobawari shita. Dakara (ware no) keikoku wa kakujitsu ni jitsugen sa rete shimatta
Saisho no sozo no tame ni, ware ga tsukareta to iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa atarashi sozo ni tsuite utagai o daite iru
Hontoni ware wa ningen o tsukutta. Soshite sono tamashi ga sasayaku koto mo shitte iru. Ware wa (ningen no) sune domyaku yori mo ningen ni chikai nodearu
Miyo, migigawa ni mata hidarigawa ni suwatte, 2-ri no (shugo no tenshi no) kanshi-sha ga kanshi suru
Kare ga mada hitokoto mo iwanai no ni, kare no hata no kanshu wa (kiroku no) junbi o totonoete iru
Soshite jissai ni shi no konsui ga otozureru. Kore wa anata ga sakete kita mono
Soshite rappa ga fuka reru. Kore wa ano yakusoku sa reta hidearu

Soshite onono no tamashi wa, otte to shogen-sha ni tomonawa rete kuru. Soshite onono no tamashi wa,(hitsuji no gun o oitateru yo ni) otte (no tenshi) hitori to (gense no shogyo o shogen suru tame no) shogen (no tenshi) hitori ni tomonawa rete yatte kuru
(Sonotoki, iwa reyou. ) `Anata wa, kono (shinpan no hi) ni tsuite jissai chui shinakatta. Ware wa ima, anata kara kutsugae o torinozoku. Kyo wa, anata no shikaku wa eibindearu
Kare no dohan no nakama wa iu. `Kore ga, watashi no junbi shita monodesu
(Sonotoki omo wa ose rareyou. ) `Anata gata ryomei, hangyaku shita ganmeina mono o subete, jigoku ni nagekome
Tadashi michi o samatageta mono, okite o yabutta mono,(shinri ni) utagai o daita mono
arra to doi ni soto no kami o tateta mono, anata gata ryomei wa, korera o kibishi chobatsu no naka ni nagekome
Kare no nakama wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi ga kare o somuka seta node wa arimasen. Kare ga (mizukara) toku mayoikonde shimatta nodesu
Kare wa ose rareyou. `Ware no mae de giron shite wa naranai. Ware wa soku ni anata gata ni keikoku shita nodearu
Ware wa itta koto o kaeru koto wanai. Mata ware no shimo be-tachi ni taishi, kesshite fuseide wa nai nodearu
Sonohi ware ga jigoku ni,`man'in ni natta ka.' To tou to,`nao oku no (hairu)-sha ga orimasu ka.' To kotaeru
Omo o osoreru mono ni wa, rakuen ga chikadzuite kuru. Sugu chikaku ni
Kore wa kaigo shite tsuneni (arra ni) kaeri (omo no okite o) mamoru subete no mono no tame ni yakusoku sa rete ita monodeari
menimienai jihibukaki okata o osore, kokoronosokokara kaigo shite (omoni) kaetta-sha-tachi no tame (no monodearu)
Yasu njite sore ni ire. Kore wa eien no hidearu
Kare-ra no tame ni wa soko ni, hoshimono wa nandemoari, mata waga moto kara motto tsuika ga arou

Ware wa kare-ra izen ni, ikaga ni oku no sedai o horoboshita koto ka. Kare-ra wa, korera (makka no tashinkyo to) yori mo chikara ni oite motto yumodeattade wanai ka. Sore de kare-ra wa sho toshi o meguri aruitaga, doko ni hinansho ga arou ka
Hontoni kono nakaniha kokoro aru mono, mata mimiwokatamukeru-sha, chushi suru mono e no kyokun ga aru
Ware wa ten to ji, mata sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o 6-nichi no ma ni sozo shita. Shikashi ware wa sukoshi no tsukare mo kanjiru koto wa nakatta
Sorede anata wa kare-ra no iu koto o shinobi,-nushi no eiko o home tatae nasai. Taiyo ga noboru mae to shizumu mae ni
Mata yoru mo, kare o tataete 唱念 Shi nasai, mata reihai no owari ni mo
Mimi o katamuke nasai. Shoshu-sha ga sugu chikai tokoro kara yobu hi ni (sonaete)
Sonohi, kare-ra wa shinjitsu no hitokoe o kikou. Sore wa (hakaba kara) deteiku-bidearu
Hontoni ware wa nama o sazuke, mata shi o ataeru. Ware ni (subete no mono no) kichaku-sho ga aru
Sonohi, daichi wa kare-ra (no tokoro) kara sake, kare-ra wa isoide deteiku. Kore koso ga shoshu de, ware ni totte wa yoina godearu
Ware wa kare-ra no iu koto o yoku shochi shite iru. Anata wa kare-ra ni kyosei shite wa naranai. Waga keikoku o osoreru-sha-tachi ni, kuruan ni yotte kunkai shi nasai
